techmeme.title: LinkedIn and Pinterest are testing programs that let publishers sell ads on their videos and pages, respectively, in exchange for a cut of the resulting revenue (Sahil Patel/The Information)
A US court ruled on July 24 that border agents must get a warrant before searching the electronic devices of US and international travelers crossing the border (Zack Whittaker/TechCrunch)
NYC-based Altana, which develops AI logistics software to help companies manage their supply chains, raised a $200M Series C at a $1B valuation (Richard Nieva/Forbes)
Germany-based osapiens, which develops ESG compliance tech, raised a $120M Series B led by Goldman Sachs Alternatives, bringing its total funding to $145M+ (Stefano De Marzo/EU-Startups)
Sources: HPE is expected to secure unconditional EU approval for its $14B acquisition of Juniper Networks; the EC is scheduled to decide on the deal by August 1 (Foo Yun Chee/Reuters)
